title: Who is this event for?
body: I just don't get it. I'm a relatively new player, I'm S4, started playing season 7, and don't have all the champs I want, so I was excited to  see I could get two free champions from the event, but HOLY MOTHER OF GOD. Why offer a reward for new players, when the event is meant for a team of five fakers? What's worse is, i don't play mid or adc, and I already got my win on a utility champ (Got backpacked as soraka), so it's even more impossible for me to make progress towards getting the free champs. I just feel like, if you want to make an insanely difficult PvE event, that's fine, but why taunt new players with Free champions, that you KNOW we'll never get, and veteran players don't need.
